RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Step Sequencer
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description:
A Step Sequencer is an intuitive, fast and fun possibility of editing a song. It is especially for live purposes and beat creation an excellent tool.
The "Lauflicht Sequencer" is a moving light, multitrack and multitimbral step sequencer. You can either begin to create a new pattern on scratch or even load the notes of a given pattern into the sequencer automatically.
For more information, the latest (beta) version, feedback, bugreports, ideas etc. please have a look at the forum or visit http://www.stepsequencer.net.
